name: Essex Theater (Under Construction)
description: The skeletal framework of what promises to be Hill Valley's grandest, albeit only, place of entertainment. The Essex Theater, currently a collection of raw timbers and half-raised walls, hints at a future filled with dubious theatricals and perhaps even a bit of dancing. The air is thick with the scent of fresh-cut pine, sawdust, and the faint, hopeful aroma of showmanship. A few rough-hewn signs, hastily nailed to posts, proclaim 'Coming Soon: Grand Opening!' to an audience of dust and indifferent tumbleweeds. Even in its incomplete state, it's a place where the promise of a good time, or at least a distraction from frontier life, is slowly being hammered into existence.
